definition: abbr. for Afghanistan 阿富汗[A1 fu4 han4]
prefix used before monosyllabic names, kinship terms etc to indicate familiarity/used in transliteration/also pr. [a4]
to agree/to consent/to be ready (to do sth)/willing

sentences.english: Supporting the Razorback football team was central to the idea of being an Arkansan.
sentences.chinese: 作爲一個阿肯色州人，核心概念就是要支持野豬隊。
阿肯色州的大多數人都是支持我的。

sentences.english: The climate of Arkansas is favourable to diversified agricultures.
sentences.chinese: 阿肯色州的氣候適宜於多種農業。

sentences.english: At 5 a.m., it was the earliest shift change in Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: 早晨5點鐘，這在阿肯色州是最早的換班時間。

sentences.english: Around 5,000 dead red-winged blackbirds dropped from the sky in Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: 阿肯色州有5，000只紅翅黑鸝從天而降死亡。

sentences.english: Bill Clinton previously served as the governor of Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: “克林頓以前曾做過阿肯色州州長”這句話該如何譯？

sentences.english: Headquarters of beautiful merchant company is located in the Kang Wei city of American Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: 美商公司總部位於美國阿肯色州的康威城。

sentences.english: In 2003, he would become Dean of the Arkansas Law School.
sentences.chinese: 2003年，他成爲了阿肯色大學法學院的院長。

sentences.english: The climate of Arkansas is favorable to diversified agricultures.
sentences.chinese: 譯阿肯色州的氣候適宜於多種農業。

sentences.english: Today around noon me and my wife drove to the University of Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: 今天晌我跟我的太太開車到大學阿肯色。

sentences.english: Applying in Arkansas was a big advantage.
sentences.chinese: 在阿肯色州提出申請很佔優勢。

sentences.english: The program listed twenty-three areas where Arkansas ranked near the bottom of all states.
sentences.chinese: 片中羅列了阿肯色州在全國墊底的23個領域。

sentences.english: When Roger was finally arrested, it was big news in Arkansas.
sentences.chinese: 羅傑最終還是被逮捕了，這在阿肯色州是頭條新聞。

sentences.english: The AEA said teachers would boycott the test.
sentences.chinese: 阿肯色州教育協會聲稱教師們會抵制這次考試。

sentences.english: In Arkansas the governor had to commute their sentences.
sentences.chinese: 而在阿肯色州，減刑必須經過州長的批准。
